content: learn how to create this cute mini halloween amigurumi pumpkin with this free pumpkin crochet pattern this is an easy and quick crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 to 2 hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini pumpkin from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger one from chenille super bulky plush yarn this free crochet pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute halloween pumpkin amigurumi link to english pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-pumpkin-crochet-pattern/ link to dutch pattern https //www mariskavos nl/nl/gratis-pompoen-haakpatroon/
